comments:
When trying to use BIRT under Fedora Enterprise Workstation 4 we get:

An SWT error has occured.  The error is UnsatisfiedLinkError: libswt-mozilla-gtk-3138.so: libxpcom.so cannot open shared object file: no such file or directory.  

However, both so files exist.

The .log contains:

Thanks!!!

I had Firefox 1.5 installed but I removed it and reinstalled the original version from the install Redhat install CD.  Once the original version was installed and a reference to the directory was created within the users profile everything worked properly.  T
